prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon resembling a prehistoric creature with a shell and tentacles.
Show me a fossil Pokemon with a unique spiral shell and bright blue accents.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a small creature into a large, ancient beast with a rocky exterior.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments, with a hard shell and soft, flowing tentacles.
Generate a creature that combines elements of a snail and a squid, featuring a large shell and vibrant colors.
Give me a depiction of a Pokemon that resembles an ancient marine animal with intricate details and unique textures.
Make a Pokemon with a round, shell-like body and striking blue features, perfect for underwater battles.
